pkgmetadata.longdescription: dlnpyutils==========A package of useful utility python functions.Authors-------- **David Nidever** (Montana State University) Installation------------You can pip install the package:: pip install dlnpyutilsTo install the latest version:: pip install git+https://github.com/dnidever/dlnpyutilsAttribution-----------.. image:: https://zenodo.org/badge/205585866.svg :target: https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/205585866If you make use of this code, please cite this work using the DOI:: Nidever, D. L. 2021, dnidever/dlnpyutils, doi:10.5281/zenodo.5764938 Documentation-------------.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/dlnpyutils/badge/?version=latest :target: http://dlnpyutils.readthedocs.io/See `the documentation <http://dlnpyutils.readthedocs.io>`_ for information on howto install and use dlnpyutils.License-------.. image:: http://img.shields.io/badge/license-GNU-blue.svg?style=flat :target: https://github.com/dnidever/doppler/blob/main/LICENSE
